[thoughtful] You know, um, maybe both of you are drowning separately when you could, er, either swim together or at least be, [honest], honest enough to let each other find different, [relieved], shores to heal on. [cough]
[defeated] Twenty years of shared history makes leaving feel like, [very meekly], admitting my whole life was a mistake.

[resigned] Maybe you should tell her since I'm clearly too much of a, [self-loathing], coward to do it myself.
